item.title: Robertmcelaney add a quote by Neal Stephenson
item.description: "Whenever serious and competent people need to get things done in the real world, all considerations of tradition and protocol fly out the window." -- Neal Stephenson

item.title: Robertmcelaney add a quote by Stephen Hawking
item.description: "Even if there is only one possible unified theory, it is just a set of rules and equations. What is it that breathes fire into the equations and makes a universe for them to describe? The usual approach of science of constructing a mathematical model cannot answer the questions of why there should be a universe for the model to describe. Why does the universe go to all the bother of existing?" -- Stephen Hawking

item.title: Robertmcelaney add a quote by Johann wolfgang von Goethe
item.description: "I love those who yearn for the impossible." -- Johann wolfgang von Goethe
